icpLegends.Data Scientists & Analytics: Own product/growth questions, metrics, and ad-hoc analysis in notebooks on top of the warehouse.
icpLegends.ML Engineers: Ship models and experiments (ranking, prediction, forecasting) from repos and notebooks.
icpLegends.Scientific Research: Researchers and policy/geo folks using notebooks to clean data, run models, and publish figures or reports.
icpLegends.Quant Research: Quants and trading researchers building models, backtests, and risk tools on internal data & helpers.
icpLegends.Product Engineers & Technical Founders: Hands-on builders who prototype data products, internal tools, and strategies across editor + notebooks.
